Howard Tellus "Lefty" Ross (April 23, 1903 â€“ December 21, 1963) was an American baseball pitcher in the Negro leagues. He played from 1924 to 1927 with the Cleveland Browns, Chicago American Giants, Indianapolis ABCs, Cleveland Elites, and Cleveland Hornets.
